::Prowl::

Prowl dodges Wildrider this time, firing two missiles at him. His 
nunchuks flip out, the two ends coming together and extending to form 
a supercharged staff.

"We'll see who dies here, Predacon," he replies, the mention of 
Autobot Prowl nagging on his mind. There was something important 
about it, but he couldn't quite remember.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Wildrider twirls in mid air from missing his target, as he lowers 
to the
> ground he spins in mid air facing Prowl again and continuesly 
moving heads
> towards him again. "I knew an old Autobot named Prowl," Wildrider 
says
> amusingly, "I hope you die half as purty (pretty) as he did, ha ha 
ha".
